lead_paragraph: BENSON--Irving. Beloved husband of Naomi (nee Goldberg), brother of Jack (Barbara) and father of Marc (Charles Sullivan) and Wendy (Peter Haskin). Service at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, Tuesday at 2pm. 1/3
